titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to make permanent the new GI bill educational assistance programs established by chapter 30 of such title, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

bill.summary: 3/17/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to make permanent the following GI bill educational assistance programs, each of which are currently scheduled to terminate on June 30, 1988: (1) the active-duty program; (2) the active-duty and Selected Reserve program; and (3) the Selected Reserve program. Amends the Department of Defense Authorization Act, 1985 to rename title VII of such Act the Montgomery GI Bill Act of 1984.
